content: prefer a looser or tighter fabric go up or down a size or two in your crochet hook if you want to make a mobius headband but don t have any bulky weight yarn you can always crochet with a double strand of dk or light 3 yarn instead approx 125 total yds both sides of this project look the same so there is no right or wrong side llleeettt sss gggeeettt ssstttaaarrrttteeeddd to begin chain 13 row 1 single_crochet into the 2nd chain from hook double_crochet into the next st single_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 repeat across chain 1 turn row 2 single_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 repeat across chain 1 turn repeat row 2 until your headband measures 18 long i worked 38 row for mine fffiiinnniiissshhhiiinnnggg oooffffff the twist is the main feature of this design so i d say it s pretty important however it s also super easy to accomplish so never fear **please note that the above tutorial pictures depict the knit version of this pattern but this part of forming the twist is still the same ** to finish off your mobius headband simply lay your work flat with the first row you worked at the bottom and the last row you worked at the top as shown above and to the left bring the bottom edge up to the top edge turn it once and line up the edges as shown above and to the right slip_stitch the top and bottom edges together tie off and weave in all ends now all you have to do is turn your new headband right side out and enjoy cccooonnngggrrraaatttuuulllaaatttiiiooonnnsss yyyooouuu vvveee mmmaaadddeee yyyooouuurrr ooowwwnnn cccrrroooccchhheeettt mmmooobbbiiiuuusss
